keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Peanut free
name: Vegan Choc-Banana Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups unsweetened almond milk with protein
1 cup Happy Way vegan choc flavour pea protein powder

recipeInstructions.text: Place oats, milk, banana, chia seeds, cacao powder and protein powder in a blender. Blend for 15 seconds or until a smooth batter almost forms. Set aside for 15 minutes.

Lightly spray a large frying pan with oil, then place over medium-low heat. Add 1/3 cup batter to pan and spread to form a 10cm round. Cook for 2 minutes or until pancake is two-thirds of the way cooked through. Flip pancake, then cook for a further 1 minute or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining batter to make 12 pancakes in total.
Divide pancakes among plates. Top with yoghurt, berries, syrup and cacao nibs.
